title: New Spotify Portal for Backstage Eases Platform Engineering
author: Jennifer Riggins
description: The path to creating Backstage involved respecting Spotify's culture of collaboration and developer autonomy. Its new portal aims to bring that ethos to all Backstage users.
cntitle: Spotify Portal for Backstage 简化平台工程
cndescription: 创建 Backstage 的路径涉及尊重 Spotify 的协作文化和开发人员自主权。其新门户旨在将这种精神带给所有 Backstage 用户。
